title: Portsmouth academic develops 'perfect espresso' formula
description: A team of mathematicians and physicists say they have the formula for consistently good coffee.

title: Hollywood icon with a career spanning seven decades
description: Kirk Douglas clawed his way up from poverty to become one of Hollywood's leading stars.

description: Dele Alli says Tottenham "deserve a trophy" as they seek to end their 12-year wait for silverware in this season's FA Cup.

title: Driver reverses car through front door of Wiltshire house
description: Firefighters took two hours to rescue the elderly woman from the car after the crash in Wiltshire.

description: Chloe Sandilands says locals are fearful of the coronavirus spreading, but she has no plans to leave China.

title: State of the Union: Trump hails 'American comeback'

title: 'My African name stopped me getting job opportunities'

description: Claims the ex-PM's protection officer left a pistol in a toilet during a flight is among Wednesday's front page stories.
